title: 383A.18 SOLDIERS' REST.
text:
Ramsey County may purchase a plot of ground in an organized cemetery lying, in whole or in part, in the county, or in a contiguous county, to be used as a soldiers' rest for the interment of honorably discharged deceased military veterans of the United States and their spouses and minor children.
Ramsey County may compensate the expenses of an agent, who must be a veteran, to care for the soldiers' rest and to issue permits for burial in it.
